content.rendered:
Directed by Anne Fletcher

Written by Jen D’Angelo. David Kirschner. Blake Harris. Jen D’Angelo. David Kirschner. Mick Garris

Star Bette Midler(Winifred Sanderson). Sarah Jessica Parker(Sarah Sanderson). Kathy Najimy(Mary Sanderson). Whitney Peak(Becca). Belissa Escobedo(Izzy). Lilia Buckingham(Cassie). Froy Gutierrez(Mike). Sam Richardson(Gilbert). Doug Jones(Billy Butcherson). Tony Hale(Mayor / Reverend Traske). Taylor Henderson(Young Winifred). Nina Kitchen(Young Mary). Juju Journey Brener(Young Sarah (as Juju Brener)). Thomas Fitzgerald(John Pritchett). Brett Cramp(Mr. Pritchett). Kim Niemi(Townsperson). Alison Weller(Townsperson). Holly Cinnamon(Townsperson). Patrick French(Townsperson). Charlotte Peed(Mrs. Smith). Ed Peed(Mr. Smith). Austin J. Ryan(Young Billy Butcherson). Hannah Waddingham(The Witch Mother). Michael Tow(Mr. Wilke). Brina(School Secretary (as Brina Healey)). Brian Wiles(Rob). Owen Earls(Liam). Skyla Sousa(Teen Winifred). Aiden Torres(Teen Mary). Emma Kaufman(Teen Sarah). Chhoyang Cheshatsang(Thom). Jaylin Pryor(Teen Gilbert). Marissa Carpio(Food Stall Woman). Naheem Garcia(Fred). Dan Finnerty(Lucas). Joshua Allan Eads(Drag Queen Winifred (as Ginger Minj)). Kornbread Jete(Drag Queen Mary (as Kornbread Jeté)). Kahmora Hall(Drag Queen Sarah). Juvan Elisma(Alex). Ryan Rosenthal(Glenn). Jen D’Angelo(Liam’s Mom). Mark Fichera(Scary Scarecrow). Jordan von Netzer(Roman Soldier). Mark Hawker(Puppeteer). Shane Dzicek(Puppeteer). Christopher Walsh(Puppeteer (as CJ Walsh)). Tiffany Brooks(Principal Dancer). Steve Antonucci(Bewitched Crowd (uncredited)). Michelle Byun(Townsperson (uncredited)). Jonathan Campano(Penguin (uncredited)). Rachael Christenson(Villager (uncredited)). Todd Davis(Townsperson (uncredited)). Brendan Edwards(Police Sergeant (uncredited)). Francesca Galeon(Cheerleader (uncredited)). Heidi Garza(Festival Goer (uncredited)). Suzanne Gillies(Drummer (uncredited)). Ethnie Hales(Student (uncredited)). Christina Largent(Festival Attendee (uncredited)). Bianca-Rose Lasky(Teenager (uncredited)). Cora Maple Lindell(High School Student (uncredited)). Terry McGinnis(Townsperson (uncredited)). Paul D. Messina(Townsperson (uncredited)). Alana Monteiro(Townsperson (uncredited)). Americo Presciutti(Festival Party Townperson (uncredited)). Russell J. Ramos(Tourist (uncredited)). Mathew Ray(High School Student (uncredited)). Audrey Redmond(Town Festival Costume Contest (uncredited)). Neal Sheldon Salisbury(Scarefest Coordinator (uncredited)). Anastasia Mousis Sanidopoulos(Dancer (uncredited)). Salvatore Santone(Magic shop employee (uncredited)). Amanda Shepherd(Emily Binx (archive footage) (uncredited)). Jay Silva(Townsperson (uncredited)). Bari Suzuki(Townsperson (uncredited)). Jenson Tavares(Villager (uncredited)). David Torres Jr.(Teacher (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Chelsea DeVincent. Steven Haft. Lynn Harris. Bonnie Hlinomaz. David Kirschner. Aldric La’auli Porter. David Scharf. Adam Shankman. Ralph Winter

Production Walt Disney Pictures. David Kirschner Productions
